trans-unit.source: "Dr. Geoff Rutledge (Chief Medical Officer) at HealthTap"
trans-unit.target: "Dr. Geoff Rutledge (Chief Medical Officer) at HealthTap"

trans-unit.source: Dr. %{ai_trademark} is an %{ai_serif}-powered personal "physician", trained by HealthTap’s network of more than 105,000 doctors, incorporates both context and clinical expertise of doctors who have helped triage hundreds of millions of patients worldwide to right levels of doctor-recommended care. Just like a sympathetic human physician, Dr. %{ai_trademark} converses with the user to understand their current complaints or concerns and uses the user’s health profile to compute the probable causes of their symptoms.
trans-unit.target: Dr. %{ai_trademark} is an %{ai_serif}-powered personal "physician", trained by HealthTap’s network of more than 105,000 doctors, incorporates both context and clinical expertise of doctors who have helped triage hundreds of millions of patients worldwide to right levels of doctor-recommended care. Just like a sympathetic human physician, Dr. %{ai_trademark} converses with the user to understand their current complaints or concerns and uses the user’s health profile to compute the probable causes of their symptoms.

trans-unit.source: HealthTap launches Compass, a revolutionary new personal healthcare application that will give employees of Flex the ability to “tap in” to intelligent and cost-effective healthcare 24/7. HealthTap Compass serves as a hub for managing all employees’ healthcare needs, from information to prescriptions and even lab test referrals and interpretations, and will replace the traditional “benefits card.”
trans-unit.target: HealthTap launches Compass, a revolutionary new personal healthcare application that will give employees of Flex the ability to “tap in” to intelligent and cost-effective healthcare 24/7. HealthTap Compass serves as a hub for managing all employees’ healthcare needs, from information to prescriptions and even lab test referrals and interpretations, and will replace the traditional “benefits card.”

trans-unit.source: HealthTap expands globally, unveiling its new “Health Operating System™ (HOPES)™" for hospitals, clinics, and community-based programs worldwide, starting with the Waikato District Health Board in New Zealand.
trans-unit.target: HealthTap expands globally, unveiling its new “Health Operating System™ (HOPES)™" for hospitals, clinics, and community-based programs worldwide, starting with the Waikato District Health Board in New Zealand.

trans-unit.source: 从涵盖137个专科领域的数千名美国顶尖医生团队中选择专家会诊，帮助您更全面地了解病情，做出明智的治疗决定。
trans-unit.target: 从涵盖137个专科领域的数千名美国顶尖医生团队中选择专家会诊，帮助您更全面地了解病情，做出明智的治疗决定。

trans-unit.source: 通过我们的网络您可咨询71000多名美国顶级医生，涉及超过137个专科领域，附属于世界顶尖的医院、大学和医疗机构。我们非常重视信用和服务质量，对所有的医生都进行了严格的资质审核和质控把关。我们仅选择各个专科领域的顶级医生，以确保客户得到最专业的会诊咨询服务。
trans-unit.target: 通过我们的网络您可咨询71000多名美国顶级医生，涉及超过137个专科领域，附属于世界顶尖的医院、大学和医疗机构。我们非常重视信用和服务质量，对所有的医生都进行了严格的资质审核和质控把关。我们仅选择各个专科领域的顶级医生，以确保客户得到最专业的会诊咨询服务。

trans-unit.source: 我曾经从医生手里拿到过一份报告，那份报告我完全看不懂。那周我预约了一次HealthTap咨询，接触到一位特别棒的医生，他的详细说明让我充分理解了报告的准确意思，非常专业和友好！谢谢你HealthTap！

trans-unit.source: We needed to quickly provide thousands of our employees with accessible, easy-to-use information and virtual care, and that’s exactly what HealthTap delivered…through HealthTap's proprietary technology and deep domain expertise.…We are proud to partner with HealthTap and support their efforts to bring this much-needed service to population managers around the world.”
trans-unit.target: We needed to quickly provide thousands of our employees with accessible, easy-to-use information and virtual care, and that’s exactly what HealthTap delivered…through HealthTap's proprietary technology and deep domain expertise.…We are proud to partner with HealthTap and support their efforts to bring this much-needed service to population managers around the world.”

trans-unit.source: These are text, voice, or video calls from patients who wish to talk with you in real time. Live consults can be taken from the comfort of your laptop, desktop, smartphone, or tablet. During a live consult, you and the patient may exchange written messages, photos, videos, and other kinds of documents to support your ability to serve the patient.
trans-unit.target: These are text, voice, or video calls from patients who wish to talk with you in real time. Live consults can be taken from the comfort of your laptop, desktop, smartphone, or tablet. During a live consult, you and the patient may exchange written messages, photos, videos, and other kinds of documents to support your ability to serve the patient.

trans-unit.source: These are asynchronous electronic messages that patients write to you. These also may include photo, video, or document attachments. You respond as soon as you can, but the exchange is not in real time.
trans-unit.target: These are asynchronous electronic messages that patients write to you. These also may include photo, video, or document attachments. You respond as soon as you can, but the exchange is not in real time.
